snippet.title: Catch the Thief, If you can! Available now!
snippet.description:
#catchthethief
#catchthethiefifyoucan

Catch the Thief, If you can! available now on steam early access!

Website: https://stargamestudios.com/games/catch-the-thief-if-you-can
Itch.io Page: https://stargamestudios.itch.io/catch-the-thief-if-you-can
Steam Page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/717760/Catch_the_Thief_If_you_can/

Catch the thief, if you can! it is a indie game developed by Star Game Studios. Now in early access on steam, this game is inspired in Keystone Kapers the classic atari's video game but now for pc game. That indie game is possible you play in local multiplayer party game or campaign mode where you need catch all thieves in the city, wild west, medival and future.

Our Games Playlists:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mYUAdrDLX40&list=PLSywKLeFaKZJzwbrhlbH4qD6-Xv_Gqq-1


🎮 Our Games:
Catch the Thief, If you can!
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/717760/Catch_the_Thief_If_you_can/
Learn More: https://www.stargamestudios.com/games/catch-the-thief-if-you-can

Natural Disasters
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2088290/Natural_Disasters/
Learn More: https://www.stargamestudios.com/games/natural-disasters

Faster - Fast Food
Learn More: https://www.stargamestudios.com/games/faster-fast-food

PigNapping
Learn More: https://www.stargamestudios.com/games/pignapping

Turtly - A Beach Fight
Learn More: https://www.stargamestudios.com/games/turtly-a-beach-fight
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.stargamestudios.TurtlyABeachFight

👉 Our game assets on the Unreal Marketplace and Unity Store:

Environments:
Stylized Beach Environment Pack: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-beach-environment-pack-procedural-generation-tool-pcg-stylised

Stylized Modular Medieval Pack: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-medieval-pack

Stylized UK Modular House and Road: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-uk-modular-house-and-road

Stylized Graveyard Pack: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-graveyard-pack

Stylized Backyard Pack: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-backyard-pack
Unity Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/stylized-backyard-pack-233992

Props:
Stylized Bedroom Furniture: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-bedroom-furniture 
UnityStore: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/furniture/stylized-bedroom-furniture-188494

Stylized Kitchen Furniture: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-kitchen-furniture
Unity Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/furniture/stylized-kitchen-furniture-189711

Stylized Living Room Furniture: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-living-room-furniture
Unity Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/furniture/stylized-living-room-furniture-189739

Stylized Bathroom Furniture: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-bathroom-furniture
Unity Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/furniture/stylized-bathroom-furniture-235204

Stylized Furniture Bundle: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-furniture-bundle
Unity Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/stylized-furniture-bundle-255475

Stylized Materials:
Stylized Materials Pack 01: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-materials-pack-01
Unity Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/stylized-materials-pack-01-235383

Stylized Materials Pack 02: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-materials-pack-02
Unity Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/stylized-materials-pack-02-251974

Stylized Wooden Roof Pack: 
Unreal Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-wooden-roof-pack
Unity Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/stylized-wooden-roof-pack-235421

Blueprints:
Stylized Truck Pack (Drivable Truck): https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-truck-pack
***Monthly Unreal Engine Sponsored Content product for Dec 2022***

Our Star Game Studios Discord server invite:
https://discord.gg/8Uj3K88
Our Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/stargamestudios/
Our X:
https://twitter.com/stargamestudios
Our Itch.Io page with all Star Game Studios games:
https://stargamestudios.itch.io/

Thanks a lot for watching and sharing my videos :)
